author: cms-L1TK
body:
PR Description
==========

This consists of several improvements to the L1 tracking code of the Phase 2 Outer Tracker made by the L1Trk group primarily in L1Trigger/TrackFindingTracklet/

1) Default CMS  geometry in L1TrackNtupleMaker_cfg.py updated to D98.
2) TTree used for L1 track analysis now has flag indicating if stub is in Tracker tilted barrel modules.
3) Bug fix in displaced L1 tracking.
4) Fix bug in eta calculation in Track.h
5) Bug fix to StubKiller module used for partially dead tracker studies.
6) Bug fixes & missing feature additions to improve agreement with L1 track firmware:
  a) Fixes to the MatchEngineUnit.
  b) Fix in MatchProcessor algorithm related to track projections.
  c) Add six bits to the TrackFitMemory output, which represent the phi regions of the two seed stubs. 

We use git CI running on 1000 ttbar + 200PU events to check that the tracking performance is not significantly affected.
title: Bug fixes & small improvements to L1 tracking of Phase 2 Outer Tracker
